description.narrative: BiH Council for Children systematically monitoring child rights and reporting to relevant international and national institutions

sector.narrative: Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Justice, birth registration/CRVS, and alternative care - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: BiH Council for Children systematically monitoring child rights and reporting to relevant international and national institutions

description.narrative: In the year of CRC@30 the Committee on the Rights of the Child issued the Concluding Observations on the combined fifth and sixth reports of Bosnia and Herzegovina (BiH). UNICEF supported the preparation of the State Report as well as the NGO Alternative Child Rights Report and the Children's CRC Report. The Ministry of Human Rights and Refugees agreed to develop, with UNICEF support and inputs from all stakeholders, a new BiH Action Plan for Children for 2020-2025 to address the CRC Observations. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/01/2020

title.narrative: Programme developed for monitoring the 2019 Concluding Observations of the Committee on the Rights of the Child to Bosnia and Herzegovina
BiH Action Plan for Children for Children 2020-2025 developed and adopted

actual.value: 2019:Council of Ministers of BiH adopted a decision to extend current AP until end 2019 and start developing a new one after CRC CR are issued. MoHRR and UNICEF started planning for the development of the next AP for Children.
